review_data.title: Speziell und fein
review_data.content: Tolles Erlebnis, wenn vor den Gästen gekocht wird! Frisch, gesund, lecker und kostenintensiv. Ist jedoch den Preis wert.

review_data.title: Excellent Teppanyaki
review_data.content: Found them on trip advisor, and was not disappointed. Excellent Teppanyaki restaurant. If you know Teppanyaki, you know it's not about the whole "BeniHana style" show, it's about the food, and this was cooked perfectly by our chef. The Salmon cold salad starter was tasty,...More

review_data.title: Excellent Tapanaki
review_data.content: Surprised to see just one review on this restaurant, I have been coming to this Airport hotel in Zurich for more than ten years and always use the Tapanaki section. Whilst I would say I always get a nice meal but on my last visit...More

review_data.title: Excelent Food and friendly Service
review_data.content: The Japanese kitchen in the Edo Garden is excelent and the Service ver friendly. The Edo Garden is open for Luncha an Dinner but not on Weekends.
